title: Introducing: Wet Wings
content: Wet Wings are a two-piece, a two-piece that will make you question whether they could possibly be a two-piece.  There’s a lot going within their debut record, Glory Glory, but beneath the avant-garde audio blemishes are weird and wonderful pop tunes that are as catchy as they are textural and layered. They also have a remarkable frankness or even politeness, there’s nothing even remotely intimidating within the record. There’s sorrow beneath the surface, granted, but the most attractive quality of the album is its innocence; stream and buy the record below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
